formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. Annual exclusions: $$E_{\text{total}} = r \times E_{y} \times s,\quad s = \begin{cases}2 & \text{if gift-splitting}\\ 1 & \text{otherwise}\end{cases}$$ 2. Taxable gifts for the year: $$T = \max\left(0,\; G - E_{\text{total}} - C - M\right)$$ 3. Effective lifetime exemption: $$L_{\text{eff}} = s \times L_{y}$$ 4. Exemption used by this gift: $$U = \min\left(T,\; \max(0, L_{\text{eff}} - P)\right)$$ 5. Estimated tax due now (Ï„ is the progressive gift tax function from IRS rate schedule): $$\text{TaxDue} = \tau\!\left(\max\!\left(0, P+T - L_{\text{eff}}\right)\right) - \tau\!\left(\max\!\left(0, P - L_{\text{eff}}\right)\right)$$
